layout.tooltip.free.trial: A short, sample test, to experience the type of questions, the ISTO test platform, and the A C C U R A T E analytics. You will receive a sample Analytics Report.
layout.tooltip.mock.test: A half-sized mock test for you to practice the ISTO Test. You will receive a detailed Analytics Report with rankings and a question-by-question breakdown of your performance.
layout.tooltip.test: The test to be taken to gain the ISTO recognition of their level of understanding of the respective ISO management systems standards. The candidate will receive an Analytics Report with rankings and a Certificate of Achievement if they meet the passing criteria.
layout.tooltip.disabled.test: Level 2 Test of Understanding will be available in second half of January 2026
layout.logout.prompt: Are you sure you want to logout?

mock.test.remote.instruction: The mock test can be taken entirely remotely, in a quiet location with stable internet connection.
mock.test.time.instruction: You may start the mock test at a time of your choosing. Press "Start Test" on the right when you are ready.

exam.pop.up.notice: To ensure you access all features of the ISTO Test Portal, please allow pop-ups from our site. If you don't see a pop-up, please check your browser settings and enable pop-ups for this site.
